comments:
I have been experiencing this problem for quite a while (it was not
happening 1 or 2 months ago).  Whenever a JUnit test fails, I am getting a
NPE as indicated below.  I've been always using the latest integration
driver and the HEAD version of org.eclipse.releng.basebuilder in my builds.

Note: The html file generated for the test is OK.

generateIndex:

Could the testManifest.xml, all the xml JUnit test logs and the 
index.php.template be supplied so I can try reproducing the problem?

Created an attachment (id=12409)
requested files

In this zip you will find all the files you've asked (we use
index.html.template instead of index.php.html).  I've also added the html and
xml file generated after the JUnit test cases and the build log.

The problem was related to a non-existant download associated with SDORUN in 
the testManifest.xml.  I have released the fix to the HEAD stream of 
org.eclipse.releng.basebuilder.
